attributes.action: To bring in Legislation to tackle Employment blacklisting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are honest,decent,and upstanding people,in this country, who through no fault of their own, have found themselves unable to obtain employment.In certain cases this situation  has been brought about,by the cowardly and vindictive act of the person having been secretly blacklisted, by their last employer. 

Therefore,as this vile situation can effect someones life for years, with that person fruitlessly seeking to obtain employment, under the regulations  that now exist in order to receive any benefit.The goverment should bring in legislation,(were any person who feels that this has happened to them, and can prove that they have made all reasonable efforts to find employment,)can have their concerns dealt with, by a dedicated panel of the DWP, who would then be legally obliged to find and place that person in a job within local goverment (Council etc.)or any other area (within reasonabilty)that they wished.
